title: Mastery skins?
body:
I think it would be awesome if there were skins that could only be unlocked with a certain amount of mastery points on a champion. 

Like make skins that you have to have for example lvl 7 mastery and 300k or 500k mastery points. Something like that. 

Anyone else have any thoughts on this?

replies.body: I believe riot was considering or mentioned mastery chromas at some point. Giving away skins would be a bit much, and making entirely new ones for every champion will never happen due to the incredible amount of work involved.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qNJhbsQr,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-08T23:50:18.111+0000)
>
> I believe riot was considering or mentioned mastery chromas at some point. Giving away skins would be a bit much, and making entirely new ones for every champion will never happen due to the incredible amount of work involved.

It should at least change the effects too, since we did put time into that champ. It would be nice to see them use different color particles for this mastery chromas.

"Golden Weapons" chroma ala Ovewatch would be awesome too (if doable).

{{champion:136}} Golden stars orbiting
I think that would be awesome. That or something similar for those masteries.
Does that make money for Riot? No? Then it will never happen. : /

That is all about chance. I keep getting stuff for Vi, Garen, Poppy (mainly top lane), and I am an ADC / MID main. So, it's kind of like knowing you are getting a present for your birthday and all you want is a puppy, but yours parents get you a goldfish. It's a pet, just not one you really wanted. Do you see where I am coming from?

Yesyesyes.

But it's too much work for riot, so I highly doubt it will happen.

But a boarder would be nice!! :3
